title: Hello and welcome to my website!

markdown.headingText: Hello and welcome to my website!
markdown.markdown:
::: {#about-block} ::: I am Menasha Senanayaka, who is currently working as an Assistant Lecturer. I am a hard-working, responsible, adaptable, and fast-learning individual who has specialised statistics. Keen in searching for new concepts in the field of statistics. Passionate about doing research and innovation using statistical concepts. Interested in statistics, machine learning, data analytics, and data science. I am eager to help researchers and academics for their projects by providing statistical consultancy. On this website, I offer a glimpse into my knowledge by sharing some of my work which includes Projects, Blog, Workshops and Teaching. Feel free to contact me for any inquiry, comments or statistical consultancy. About me: ## **Education** * **BSc (Honours) in Statistics | January 2019 - June 2023**
Department of Statistics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka ## **Experience** * **Lecturer (Resource Person) | November 2024 - Present**
Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka (IASSL)
Sri Lanka * **Assistant Lecturer | August 2024 - Present**
Department of Mathematics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka * **Teaching Assistant | July 2023 - April 2024**
Department of Statistics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka * **Statistical Consultant | January 2023 - April 2024**
Department of Statistics, Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of Sri Jayewardenepura
Sri Lanka * **Intern - Data Analyst | June 2022 - December 2022**
Retailer Analytics Team, Analytics Division, Dialog Axiata PLC
Sri Lanka ## **Honours and Awards** * **IASSL Best Research Awards - 2023**
Organized by Institute of Applied Statistics Sri Lanka
Won a merit award for the undergraduate research project titled "Effectiveness of Using Candlestick Charts to Forecast Ethereum Price Direction: A Machine Learning Approach". ## **Publications** * Senanayaka, N. I. M. B., & Pathberiya, H. A. (2024). Effectiveness of Using Candlestick Charts to Forecast Ethereum Price Direction: A Machine Learning Approach. *Sri Lankan Journal of Applied Statistics*, 25(1), 34-48.
DOI: 10.4038/sljas.v25i1.8131
